text:
:mega: Calling all Developers! :mega:

HubSpot is kicking off the next Theme Accelerator - May 25th @ 10am EST*

Join us by <https://HubSpot.zoom.us/webinar/register/WN_ELMOQauLQSSRWCtqa4-Nig|registering here> to hear all the juicy details, including:
 :HubSpot-certified:Theme Accelerator program overview
:timer_clock:Timelines & deliverables
:moneybag:what's in it for *you*!

Can't wait to see you there!!! :sprocket-dance:
(*P.S. If you can't make it live, that's ok! Register anyways...we'll send you the meeting recording & loop you in on future details too)

A reminder that on Monday, we'll be streamlining our public channels to make our Dev Slack a more effective community. There should be specific updates in every channel impacted today. If you have any questions or feedback, please don't hesitate to reach out!

Hey everyone, i’m new to HubSpot CMS development, is it possible to make themes for our clients who are not on HubSpot pro CMS (HubSpot starter) or is it strictly a CMS Pro tier option?

I noticed that I could not access the HubDB but if it’s workable without that it’s not a major problem
